name: Ruins Run
description:
In a world where no robots are allowed, you build a shelter in an abandoned city.

Unfortunately evil cubes found you and destroyed your battery storage. 

Now, without your energy you are quickly decaying. 

Run and replenish your power before its too late.

Move with WASD and jump with Space.

Avoid dangers and get the most distance traveled. 

Exit with Esc.

Made in 4 days by me and my brother for Endless game Jam.

All art and code made by ourself, 

Sfx made with "sfxr",

Font from google fonts called "Roboto".
